description: Tens of thousands of pets are abandoned every summer in France. What's behind this sad phenomenon?
title: Why the French are 'European champions' at abandoning pets
title_page: Why the French are 'European champions' at abandoning pets - BBC News
maintext: "In France, where the state is so omnipresent, people are so used to getting prescription medication from a pharmacy without handing over any money," she says. "They are shocked when they have to pay to treat their pets. As a result, many domestic animals are abandoned when they get sick or old."
